Articles.Content: I for the life of me can't figure out how to select a kerbal inside of a hitchhiker canister. I have two guys on my station, one in the cupola module and one in the hitchhiker. I'd like to switch them, or have one do some EVA or something, but I can't seem to get to him. Can someone help me out?
You should be able to click on the hatch to access the controls.
Yeah the Hitchhicker's module isn't a command pod, so it won't show a picture of your Kerbal in the bottom right of your screen, the only way to get him out is by clicking the hatch and then EVA him
Thanks. Didn't occur to me to just click on the hatch.
